amendment.description: At the end of the bill, insert the following: TITLE V--APPLICATION SEC. 501. APPLICATION. Notwithstanding any other provision of this Act, this Act shall not apply to any lands or waters in the Third Congressional District of Colorado as in existence on the date of enactment of this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-264 states that this bill shall not apply to any lands or waters within the Third Congressional District of Colorado.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Curtis amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 240 (Roll no. 605).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Curtis.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Curtis amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 240 (Roll no. 605).
